description: Normalized Governance Agent Threshold Manifest (GATM) v2.0. Defines strict operational SLOs and mandatory enforcement policies, separating time-bound operational limits from core governance constants, utilizing standardized policy IDs (P_*) for linkage to the Governance Policy Definition Registry (GPDR).

StateTransition_MandatoryReviewRatio.description: Ratio (0.0-1.0) above which transition requires mandatory immediate governance review and audit logging.

latency_slos.note: Converted from 1.0 seconds for internal standardization

frequency_limits.note: Limits Requests for Resource Provisioning (RRP) over a 7-day period.
